column1: Little Gelion was a lesser river that rose beneath Himring in the north marches of Beleriand
column2: whose spring was close by that of the Celon. Where the Celon ran southwest towards the borders of Doriath
column3: the Little Gelion followed a twisting course to the southeast
column4: where it joined with the Greater Gelion to form the long river Gelion itself.  The river formed the southwest border of the ward of Maglor.
